entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Digby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 5:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: N 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of rain mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
